languages.text: "Шерин! Зрители арены навек запомнят наше кровавое представление, словно мы написали его тончайшими иглами на их зрачках! Темный город трепещет перед нами, и мы обязаны восславить героев!" {n}Залихватские слова Джай повисают в безрадостной и сырой тишине.{/n}

"Shereen! The spectators in the arena won't ever forget our bloody spectacle — we couldn't have been more memorable if we'd tattooed our names right on their eyeballs! The Dark City trembles before us, and we simply must honour the heroes of the hour!" {n}Jae's ebullient words ring out in the joyless, dank silence.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Шерин! Зрители арены навек запомнят наше кровавое представление, словно мы написали его тончайшими иглами на их зрачках! Темный город трепещет перед нами, и мы обязаны восславить героев!" {n}Залихватские слова Джай повисают в безрадостной и сырой тишине.{/n}

The Dark City trembles before us, and we simply must honour the heroes of the hour!" {n}Jae's ebullient words ring out in the joyless, dank silence.{/n}

The Dark City trembles before us, and we simply must honour the heroes of the hour!" {n}Jae's ebullient words ring out in the joyless, dank silence.{/n}

"Shereen! The spectators in the arena won't ever forget our bloody spectacle — we couldn't have been more memorable if we'd tattooed our names right on their eyeballs! The Dark City trembles before us, and we simply must honour the heroes of the hour!" {n}Jae's ebullient words ring out in the joyless, dank silence.{/n}

languages.text: “亲爱的！竞技场上的观众永远都不会忘记咱们那场血腥的战斗！如果咱们可以把名字纹在那些家伙的眼球上，他们恐怕永远都不会忘了！黑暗之城在我们面前颤抖，是时候向英雄们致敬了！”{n}婕伊热情洋溢的话语响了起来，回荡在阴郁的寂静之中。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Shereen! The spectators in the arena won't ever forget our bloody spectacle — we couldn't have been more memorable if we'd tattooed our names right on their eyeballs! The Dark City trembles before us, and we simply must honour the heroes of the hour!" {n}Jae's ebullient words ring out in the joyless, dank silence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “亲爱的！竞技场上的观众永远都不会忘记咱们那场血腥的战斗！如果咱们可以把名字纹在那些家伙的眼球上，他们恐怕永远都不会忘了！黑暗之城在我们面前颤抖，是时候向英雄们致敬了！”{n}婕伊热情洋溢的话语响了起来，回荡在阴郁的寂静之中。{/n}

languages.text: 「シェリーン！闘技場の観客は、我々の血まみれの大立ち回りを決して忘れないでしょうね。彼らの眼球にアタシたちの名前を刻んでおくには、これほど印象深いことはないでしょうよ！仄暗き都はアタシたちの目の前で震えている。アタシたちはただ、時の英雄を称えないとね！」{n}ジェイの陽気な言葉が、喜びのない陰気な静寂の中に響き渡る。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Shereen! The spectators in the arena won't ever forget our bloody spectacle — we couldn't have been more memorable if we'd tattooed our names right on their eyeballs! The Dark City trembles before us, and we simply must honour the heroes of the hour!" {n}Jae's ebullient words ring out in the joyless, dank silence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「シェリーン！闘技場の観客は、我々の血まみれの大立ち回りを決して忘れないでしょうね。彼らの眼球にアタシたちの名前を刻んでおくには、これほど印象深いことはないでしょうよ！仄暗き都はアタシたちの目の前で震えている。アタシたちはただ、時の英雄を称えないとね！」{n}ジェイの陽気な言葉が、喜びのない陰気な静寂の中に響き渡る。{/n}

languages.text: «¡Shereen! Los espectadores de la arena no olvidarán el sangriento espectáculo. ¡No podríamos ser más memorables si les tatuáramos nuestros nombres en el ojo! ¡La Ciudad Siniestra tiembla ante nosotros y es hora de honrar a los héroes del momento!». {n}Las entusiastas palabras de Jae chocan con el lóbrego y triste silencio.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Shereen! The spectators in the arena won't ever forget our bloody spectacle — we couldn't have been more memorable if we'd tattooed our names right on their eyeballs! The Dark City trembles before us, and we simply must honour the heroes of the hour!" {n}Jae's ebullient words ring out in the joyless, dank silence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Shereen! Los espectadores de la arena no olvidarán el sangriento espectáculo. ¡No podríamos ser más memorables si les tatuáramos nuestros nombres en el ojo! ¡La Ciudad Siniestra tiembla ante nosotros y es hora de honrar a los héroes del momento!». {n}Las entusiastas palabras de Jae chocan con el lóbrego y triste silencio.{/n}

languages.text: « Shereen ! Les spectateurs de l'arène ne sont pas près d'oublier le spectacle sanglant que nous leur avons offert. La seule façon de les marquer davantage, ça aurait été de leur tatouer notre nom directement sur la pupille ! La Cité Crépusculaire tremble face à nous, et nous devons rendre hommage aux héros du moment ! » {n}Les paroles pleines de verve de Jae résonnent dans le silence morose.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Shereen! The spectators in the arena won't ever forget our bloody spectacle — we couldn't have been more memorable if we'd tattooed our names right on their eyeballs! The Dark City trembles before us, and we simply must honour the heroes of the hour!" {n}Jae's ebullient words ring out in the joyless, dank silence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Shereen ! Les spectateurs de l'arène ne sont pas près d'oublier le spectacle sanglant que nous leur avons offert. La seule façon de les marquer davantage, ça aurait été de leur tatouer notre nom directement sur la pupille ! La Cité Crépusculaire tremble face à nous, et nous devons rendre hommage aux héros du moment ! » {n}Les paroles pleines de verve de Jae résonnent dans le silence morose.{/n}

languages.text: "Shereen! Die Zuschauer in der Arena werden unser blutiges Spektakel niemals vergessen – selbst wenn wir unsere Namen direkt auf ihre Augäpfel tätowiert hätten, hätte unser Auftritt nicht denkwürdiger ausfallen können! Die Dunkle Stadt erzittert vor uns und wir müssen den Helden der Stunde absolut die Ehre erweisen!" {n}Jaes überschwängliche Worte treffen auf eine freudlose, feuchte Stille.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Shereen! The spectators in the arena won't ever forget our bloody spectacle — we couldn't have been more memorable if we'd tattooed our names right on their eyeballs! The Dark City trembles before us, and we simply must honour the heroes of the hour!" {n}Jae's ebullient words ring out in the joyless, dank silence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Shereen! Die Zuschauer in der Arena werden unser blutiges Spektakel niemals vergessen – selbst wenn wir unsere Namen direkt auf ihre Augäpfel tätowiert hätten, hätte unser Auftritt nicht denkwürdiger ausfallen können! Die Dunkle Stadt erzittert vor uns und wir müssen den Helden der Stunde absolut die Ehre erweisen!" {n}Jaes überschwängliche Worte treffen auf eine freudlose, feuchte Stille.{/n}

languages.text: "Şirinim! Arenadaki izleyiciler, kanlı gösterimizi unutamıyorlar. İsimlerimizi direkt göz bebeklerine dövme yapsaydık, ancak bu kadar hatırlarında kalabilirdik! Kara Şehir önümüzde titriyor ve biz de günün kahramanlarını onurlandırmalıyız!" {n}Jae'ın coşkun sözcükleri cansız, küf kokulu sessizlikte çınlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Shereen! The spectators in the arena won't ever forget our bloody spectacle — we couldn't have been more memorable if we'd tattooed our names right on their eyeballs! The Dark City trembles before us, and we simply must honour the heroes of the hour!" {n}Jae's ebullient words ring out in the joyless, dank silence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Şirinim! Arenadaki izleyiciler, kanlı gösterimizi unutamıyorlar. İsimlerimizi direkt göz bebeklerine dövme yapsaydık, ancak bu kadar hatırlarında kalabilirdik! Kara Şehir önümüzde titriyor ve biz de günün kahramanlarını onurlandırmalıyız!" {n}Jae'ın coşkun sözcükleri cansız, küf kokulu sessizlikte çınlıyor.{/n}
